classes.title: Gold
classes.label: Great Question
classes.description: Gold badge achievement that a user earns within a community.

classes.title: Silver
classes.label: Favorite Question
classes.description: Silver badge achievement that a user earns within a community.

classes.title: Bronze
classes.label: Altruist
classes.description: Bronze badge achievement that a user earns within a community.

classes.title: Gold
classes.description: Badge which displays the total number of gold badges a user has earned.

classes.title: Silver
classes.description: Badge which displays the total number of silver badges a user has earned.

classes.title: Bronze
classes.description: Badge which displays the total number of bronze badges a user has earned.

classes.title: Bounty
classes.description: Badge which notes that a user has offered a reward for an answer to their question.

classes.title: Post votes
classes.description: Badge which notes the total number of votes (upvotes minus downvotes) a user's post has earned.

classes.title: Accepted answer
classes.description: Badge which notes the total number of votes (upvotes minus downvotes) a user's post has earned and signifies that their post was the accepted answer.

classes.title: Reputation increase
classes.description: Badge which notes reputation points earned.

classes.title: Reputation decrease
classes.description: Badge which notes reputation points taken away.

classes.title: Important
classes.description: Badge which notes important activity.

classes.title: Info
classes.label: Draft
classes.description: Information badge styling. Used to indicate a draft state.

classes.title: Warn
classes.label: Review
classes.description: Warning badge styling. Used to indicate a review state.

classes.title: Muted
classes.label: Archived
classes.description: Muted badge styling. Used to indicate an archived state.

classes.title: Danger
classes.label: Closed
classes.description: Danger badge styling. Used to indicate a closed state.

classes.title: Muted
classes.label: Pinned
classes.description: Filled muted badge styling. Used to indicate something is pinned.

classes.title: Danger
classes.label: Deleted
classes.description: Filled danger badge styling. Used to indicate something is deleted.

classes.title: Icon
classes.label: Filtered
classes.description: Adds some margin overrides that apply to an icon within a badge.

classes.title: Admin
classes.label: Admin
classes.description: Badge indicating user is an admin.

classes.title: Moderator
classes.label: Moderator
classes.description: Badge indicating user is an moderator.

classes.title: Staff
classes.label: Staff
classes.description: Badge indicating user is staff.

classes.title: Default
classes.label: Regular
classes.description: Default sized badge.

classes.title: Small
classes.label: Small
classes.description: Small sized badge.

classes.title: Extra Small
classes.label: Extra small
classes.description: Extra small sized badge.
